description:
A stranger comes to a fishing village, which plans to catch lots of fish through poisoning the river.  As the villagers debate, they are warned against this by a traveling priest. A fisherman saves a little turtle and is taken to an undersea palace. Two boys go to ask the fire god to help them with a demon who`s been raiding their village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Monoiu Sakana / Urashima Tarou / Oni no Tegata
The Talking Fish / Urashima Tarou / The Demon`s Handprint
ものいう魚 / 浦島太郎 / 鬼の手形
